original_text: And he said to him, ‘Well done, good servant! Because you have been faithful in a very little, you shall have authority over ten cities.’
korean_text: 주인이 이르되 잘하였다 착한 종이여 네가 지극히 작은 것에 충성하였으니 열 고을 권세를 차지하라 하고

sentences.original_text: Because you have been faithful in a very little,
you shall have authority over ten cities.’
